孼字的基本解释

孼
niè
同“孽”。

孼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》魚列切，入薛，疑。］
亦作“孼1”。
(1)旧时指庶子或旁支。
(2)指后代。多含贬义。
(3)地位低贱。参见“孽妾”。
(4)歧视；怀疑。
(5)灾害，灾祸。
(6)指邪气。
(7)罪孽，罪过。
(8)恶；邪恶。参见“孽報”、“孽類”、“孽黨”。
(9)指作乱或邪恶的人。
(10)为害，使受忧患。
(11)忤逆，不孝顺。
(12)受伤之鸟。
(13)喻指败将。
(14)见“孽孽”。
(15)通“糵”。
(16)通“櫱”。分枝；幼芽。
(17)通“櫱”。萌生，产生。

孼字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【子字部】　孼； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页281第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?魚列切，音闑。【說文】庶子也。【玉篇】憂也。【史記·商君傳】商君者，衞之庶孼公子也。【禮·玉藻】公子曰臣孼。【註】公侯衆子也。　又【通論】妾隸之子曰孼，孼之言蘖也，有罪之女，沒入於公，得幸而有所生，若木旣伐而生枿，故於文从子辥爲孼。孼，辠也。　又【爾雅·釋訓】孼孼，戴也。【詩·衞風】庶姜孼孼。【傳】孼孼盛飾也。　又孼與㜸通。【前漢·賈誼傳】庶人㜸妾緣其履。　又借爲妖孼之孼。【左傳·昭十年】蘊利生孼。【註】蘊，畜也。孼，妖害也。又【前漢·五行志】蟲豸之妖謂之孼。　又叶倪祭切，音義。【焦氏·易林】政令無常，下民多孼。叶上類。　又糱从米，麯糱也，與孼㜸義別。俗譌以媒糱之糱與孼同，非是。㜸字从辥。从薛俗字。

Mi
Basic explanation of words
Mi
niè
Same "sin".
Mi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guang Yun" cut the fish line, enter Xue, doubt. ]
Also known as "Mi 1".
(1) In the old days, it referred to the concubine or side branch.
(2) Refers to the offspring. More derogatory.
(3) Low status. See "Nie Concubine".
(4) Discrimination; doubt.
(5) Disasters, disasters.
(6) Refers to evil spirits.
(7) Sins, sins.
(8) Evil; evil. See "Nie Bao", "Nie Class", "Nie Party".
(9) Refers to a chaotic or evil person.
(10) Do harm and cause suffering.
(11) Rebellious and unfilial.
(12) Wounded bird.
(13) Yu refers to defeated generals.
(14) See "Iniquity".
(15) Through "糵".
(16) Through "櫱". Branches; young buds.
(17) Link "Qiao". Sprouted, produced.
Mi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 1] [Sub Word Department] 　孼; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 281 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Fish column cut, sound. [Said the text] Shu Zi also. [Jade articles] Worry too. 【Historical Records·Shangjun Biography】Shangjun is also the son of Wei Zhishu. 【Rite·Yuzao】The son said Chen Mi. [Note] The sons of Gong Hou also.　[General Theory] The son of the concubine is called Mi, and the words of the Mi are also guilty. The guilty daughter is submerged in Yu Gong, and she is lucky to have a life. Mi, also.　[Erya·Shixun] Mi Mi, Dai Ye. 【Poetry·Weifeng】Su Jiang Mi Mi. [Biography] Mi Mi Sheng also decorated.　孼孼和㜸通. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] Concubine concubine fate with him.　 Also borrowed as the widow of the demon. [Zuo Zhuan·Ten Years of Zhao] Yun Li Sheng Mi. [Note] Yun, livestock. Mi, the demon is also harmful. Also【Previous Han·Five Elements】The demon of insects is called Zhi Mi.　Ye Ni sacrifices to cut, sound and meaning. [Jiao's Yilin] The government is impermanent, and there are many people under the government. Leaf class.　 You 糵 from rice, Qu 糵 also, farewell to 孼 㜸. It is not true that the vulgar rice is the same as the rice by the medium rice.㜸The word is from 辥. From Xue vulgar characters.
